attributes.action: Delete removal of Age Alowances for future pensioners and the freezing of çurrent allowances from 2012/13 budget
attributes.additional_details:
Remove this unfair unprecedented attack on low income older people and the disproportionate and discriminatory impact it will have on people reaching 65 in the next three years. which will make all  new pensioners  after April 2013 who pay any tax substantially worse off.

The myth pensioners have done better than others in financial terms in recent years is not supported by the facts with pesioners incomes from savings decimated and inflation on older peoples typical expenditure having risen massively.
